triggerEventRef.description: Reference to the unique name of a 'produced' event definition

resultEventRef.description: Reference to the unique name of a 'consumed' event definition

resultEventTimeout.description: Maximum amount of time (ISO 8601 format) to wait for the result event. If not defined it should default to the actionExecutionTimeout

data.description: Expression which selects parts of the states data output to become the data of the produced event.

contextAttributes.description: Add additional extension context attributes to the produced event

invoke.description: Specifies if the function should be invoked sync or async. Default is sync.
